com.appnexus.opensdk

Interface AdListener


  • public interface AdListener
    Implement this interface to create a class which can react to ad events.
    Author:
    Jacob Shufro

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdClicked(AdView adView)
      Called when an ad is clicked, and the user is directed to the landing page.
      void onAdCollapsed(AdView adView)
      Called when an ad is closed/unexpanded.
      void onAdExpanded(AdView adView)
      Called when an ad expands due to interaction.
      void onAdLoaded(AdView adView)
      Called when an ad has successfully been loaded from the server.
      void onAdRequestFailed(AdView adView)
      Called when an ad request fails.

    • Method Detail

      • onAdLoaded

        void onAdLoaded(AdView adView)
        Called when an ad has successfully been loaded from the server.
        Parameters:
        adView - The AdView that loaded the ad.

      • onAdRequestFailed

        void onAdRequestFailed(AdView adView)
        Called when an ad request fails.
        Parameters:
        adView - The AdView that loaded the ad.

      • onAdExpanded

        void onAdExpanded(AdView adView)
        Called when an ad expands due to interaction.
        Parameters:
        adView - The AdView that loaded the ad.

      • onAdCollapsed

        void onAdCollapsed(AdView adView)
        Called when an ad is closed/unexpanded.
        Parameters:
        adView - The AdView that loaded the ad.

      • onAdClicked

        void onAdClicked(AdView adView)
        Called when an ad is clicked, and the user is directed to the landing page.
        Parameters:
        adView - The AdView that loaded the ad.
